DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; FEEDING BRAZILIANS
DOC.TEXT: Brazilian defender Jorginho has been successful in recruiting teammates to join a national anti-hunger campaign.The team already has donated an imported car to the cause , and now Jorginho is trying to get the players to kick_in their World Cup bonuses . The crusade to feed a reported 32 million starving Brazilians is led by sociologist Herbert de Souza . In keeping with tradition for Brazilian heroes , the Nobel Peace Prize nominee goes_by one name , Betinho . RANDY HARVEY
